title: Fireside with the Underboss "People Like You Are a Target, You're Not Getting Out of Here"
description: Allie Boy, Louie Milito and Sammy start scheming and robbing together. Their plans take them to Puerto Rico where they run into nothing but trouble.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Allie Boy, Louie Milito and Sammy start scheming and robbing together. Their plans take them to Puerto Rico where they run into nothing but trouble.
